title: Number of knife crimes in London 2010 to 2019
summary: This statistic shows the Number knife London offences from 2010/11 to 2017/18 , and provides a projection for 2018/19 .
In crop Year 2015/16 , the Number London offences in the knife amounted to 9.74 (in 1,000s) .
gold: In 2018/19 the number of knife crime offences recorded in London reached almost 15 thousand , an increase of more than five thousand compared with 2015/16.
This rise reversed the trend of decreasing knife crime offences recorded between 2011/12 and 2014/15 , which saw a reduction of knife crime offences from just over 14 thousand to under 9.7 thousand.
A wider trend The increase in knife crime witnessed in London has occurred alongside a general increase in overall knife crime throughout England and Wales .
